tag_list: founder, ceo, owner, president, entrepreneur, consultant, strategist
overview:
Arun Rajasingh Founder & CEO, Kenriche Technologies Private Limited arun@kenriche.com

Extensive experience in marketing and sales, operations, R&D, and the financial management of small and medium technology businesses. Product knowledge spans job portal, real estate portal and classifieds portal.

Rich experience in Interaction & Visual design, Usability, Creative Direction, Product UI, information architecture, prototyping, user research, analysis, User Testing, User Interface Design, Human Computer Interaction, Accessibility, and Search Engine Optimization. My experience in a multitude of subjects including health, music and entertainment, marketing and advertising, education and software development have allowed me to learn flexibility, responsibility and the importance of meeting goals on time and my clients’ needs.
